spells.title: Run
spells.description: For the next hour you can run as fast as a horse.

spells.title: Walk on walls/ceiling
spells.description: For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

spells.title: Speed
spells.description: For the next 2 seconds the time flows 100 times slower for you, so it feels to you like 3 minutes.

spells.title: Shockwave
spells.description: Thunderous shockwave in the direction you are facing. The wave knocks up to three creatures backward and hits them each for 2 damage.

spells.title: Small Fireball
spells.description: Deals 3 damage. Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.

spells.title: Freeze Ray
spells.description: Deals 4 damage, freezes liquids, covers objects with ice, creates ice on the ground.

spells.title: Electricute
spells.description: A bolt of lightning strikes it from the sky or from your hands, dealing 5 damage and melting metallic objects.

spells.title: Impair Senses
spells.description: Impair the person's/creature's sight or hearing for the next hour.

spells.title: Stun
spells.description: Stun the target creature for 1 minute. It's unable to move or do anything.

spells.title: Minor Telekinesis
spells.description: Slowly levitate small objects.

spells.title: Push/Pull metal
spells.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move. If an object is thrown at a speed, deals 4 damage.

spells.title: Force field
spells.description: Stationary transparent physical barrier, sphere of 15 meter radius. Anything can get out, nothing can go in.

spells.title: Greater Telekinesis
spells.description:
Levitate human-sized objects and creature
Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object.
(requires “Minor Telekinesis”)

spells.title: Gift Health
spells.description: Drains your health, giving it to another person/creature.

spells.title: Gift Energy
spells.description: Drains your health, giving it to another person/creature.

spells.title: Heal
spells.description: Heal a person/creature by 1 hit point for every energy point you spend.

spells.title: Inspire
spells.description:
Give an inspiring speech or tell a war story, and all your allies will gain 4 Energy Points.
The player actually has to tell the speech/story.

spells.title: Charm Person
spells.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

spells.title: Influence
spells.description: Speak to the person and influence their state of mind for the next hour. Choose one of the psychological effects (increased confidence, anxiety, euphoria, fear, paranoia, calm, irritability, etc).

spells.title: No Secrets
spells.description:
Find out if an ally is keeping an important secret from you.
You’ll learn who they are but not what the secret is.

spells.title: Redirect Feelings
spells.description: When an NPCs has some strong feelings toward you (love, anger, etc), you can redirect that feeling to a different target for a day.

spells.title: Minor Illusion
spells.description: Create an illusion of an object (no larger than a person) or a sound within 50 meters and your line of sight.

spells.title: Fake Death
spells.description: Appear to be dead for the next 30 minutes.

spells.title: Invisibility
spells.description: Turn yourself, a willing creature, or an object (no larger than a horse) invisible for the next 20 minutes. When they take damage they reappear.

spells.title: Embody fear
spells.description: The target person/creature see the image of whatever they fear the most.

spells.title: Illusory Automaton
spells.description: Create an illusory person or a creature that can perform simple tasks you give it. It has 5 hit points, lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

spells.title: Veil
spells.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When a creature touches the illusion they can no longer see it.

spells.title: Major Illusion
spells.description: Create an object no larger than an elephant, complete with sounds, smells, movement.

spells.title: Message
spells.description: Telepathically send a message to the nearby creature, they can respond back.

spells.title: Inquire
spells.description: You learn the creature's Ideal, Flaw, and Desire. You can also learn the worst or best thing they have ever done.

spells.title: Mind Sense
spells.description: Sense minds in 30 meter radius around you. Get some basic information about each mind – how complex their thoughts are, their species, their gender, their mood.

spells.title: Intent
spells.description: You look into the mind of the creature, learning about their most prominent short-term goal (what they want to accomplish within the next 10 minutes), long term goal, or what their intentions are towards a specific creature or an object.

spells.title: Comprehend Languages
spells.description: Understand the language of the person you're speaking to.

spells.title: Read Surface Thoughts
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you can hear and understand what a target creature within 50 meters is thinking.

spells.title: Read Memories
spells.description: Search through unconscious creature's mind, pulling out 15 minutes of memories.

spells.title: Mind Stealer
spells.description: Eat a person’s brain, and for the next hour you have access to their skills and memories.

spells.title: Sleep
spells.description: Sing the lullaby, causing the target creatures within 30 meters around you to fall asleep. (you actually need to come up with and sing a lullaby).

spells.title: Captivate
spells.description:
Conjure a dazzling image in the air,
(describe the image), captivating anyone who looks at it. Image hangs in the air for 10 minutes then dissipates.

spells.title: Alter Senses
spells.description: Change the way the target will experience the world for the next day. Cause them to perceive a specific thing or a category of things falsely (make them see all wolves as puppies, the king as a clown, see all the doors shifted 5 paces away from where they actually are, have them think that freshly baked bread smells like fire. etc). The spell lasts until you cancel it or until the creature is harmed by the effects of the deception.

spells.title: Suggestion
spells.description: Influence target's thoughts and behaviors. Making them trust someone they otherwise wouldn't, look away, feel an emotion they would not normally be inclined to feel, calm or intensify what they feel.

spells.title: Puppeteering
spells.description: Compel the target to physically take an action that lasts no longer than 5 seconds  - jump, kick, throw something, release an arrow, etc.

spells.title: Remoralization
spells.description: Until the end of the day, the NPC shapes their behavior around their ideal

spells.title: Compel Truth
spells.description: The target is compelled to answer all questions truthfully for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Mind wiping
spells.description: Touch an unconscious person/creature, and erase any 15 minutes of their memory, or all their recent memories up to 1 month ago.

spells.title: Alter Memory
spells.description: Change any 15 minutes of the character’s memory.

spells.title: Value Change
spells.description:
You reach deep into the person’s soul, and change what they value the most in life. Lasts for 1 hour. After it’s dispelled, the person knows you’ve done it to them.
Highly illegal, punishable by death in all civilized societies.
Possess a creature. You control a possessed creature, can read it’s mind and use it’s skills.

spells.title: Dominate
spells.description: You gain full control over the person for an hour. You can issue commands, or take control over their mind directly - see through their senses and control their body, but during that time you lose awareness of your own body and what's going on around you. The spell lasts 1 hour, spend 2 energy per hour to extend the duration.

spells.title: Evil Eye
spells.description: You pause, closing your eyes and quieting your mind. You sense the worst thing that  happened nearby within the last day.

spells.title: Sense Danger
spells.description: Activate your 'spidey sense', for the next 30 minutes you'll be able to sense imminent danger.

spells.title: Sense Magic
spells.description: You can sense the magic auras of any spells, items, or creatures within 200 meters around you. You'll get a vague sense of what they are, and their general direction. Allows you to detect illusions.

spells.title: Infrasight
spells.description: Sense heat emanating from creatures. You can sense it through walls.

spells.title: Seek
spells.description: You glimpse the target in real time, can see its surroundings, and may watch it for the next minute.

spells.title: Nemesis
spells.description:
Mark a creature you can see as your nemesis(you can have only one at a time).
Now you will always sense when the nemesis is nearby, and the direction they’re in.
(even if they’re invisible)

spells.title: Find Nemesis
spells.description: You see the vision of a place your nemesis has visited in the past day.

spells.title: Familiar Transposition.
spells.description: Swap places with your familiar.

spells.title: Summon Item
spells.description: Mark an object or an item (no larger than 2x2 meters). Whenever you cast this spell, it will teleport to your hand (or in front of you) from wherever it is.

spells.title: Rewind
spells.description:
Teleport where you physically were 5 minutes ago(doesn’t take you back in time)
Open Portal. From where you are to anything within line of sight.
Greater Teleportation. Teleport any object, willing or unwilling creature, within 100 meters to another point within 100 meters.

spells.title: Summon Familiar
spells.description: Summon a small creature who will be your pet and a friend. You can communicate with it telepathically, give it commands, see through its eyes, hear what it hears, cast spells through it. If the creature takes damage it disappears, but you can resummon it.

spells.title: Fire hose
spells.description: For the next minute, a stream of water shoots from your hand like from a fire hose.

spells.title: Summon a creature.
spells.description: Summon an animal or a monster. It obeys your commands. Disappears within an hour.

spells.title: Conjure a Mundane Item
spells.description:
Create a small non-magical item you’re familiar with (like a hammer, a spyglass, or a candle). No larger than 3 feet cube, no heavier than 10 pounds.
The object is visibly magical, disappears after 1 hour, or if it takes any damage.

spells.title: Create a wall
spells.description:
Creates a stone wall, 10x10 meters.
Window is optional.

spells.title: Transfiguration
spells.description: Turn an object into any other object of the same size made out of the same material.

spells.title: Mending
spells.description: Fix a broken non-magical item.

spells.title: Split
spells.description: Splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your energy points. Sustaining a clone takes 2 EP per hour. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage or runs out of energy points, it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies.

spells.title: Petrify
spells.description: Turns the creature or object you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Grow gills
spells.description: Touch a willing creature, and they grow gills allowing them to breathe underwater for up to 1 hour.

spells.title: Turn into Creature
spells.description: Touch a willing non-magical creature and spend an Experience point to “acquire” it. Now you can turn into this creature for up to an hour.

spells.title: Turn into Person
spells.description: Touch a willing person and spend an Experience point to “acquire” them. Now you can turn into this person for up to an hour.

spells.title: Shapeshift Target
spells.description:
Touch a willing or unconscious creature or a person, turning them into a creature/person you have acquired.
(requires Turn into Creature or Turn into Person)

spells.title: Turn into a Magical Creature
spells.description:
Works like Turn into Creature, but works on magical creatures.
(requires Turn into Creature)

spells.title: Shield
spells.description: Create a force field around a target creature or an object. Resists up to 8 damage.  Always has clean air inside. Lasts for an hour, or until it takes more than 8 damage.

spells.title: Anti-magic ward
spells.description: Magic doesn’t work within a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Sight ward
spells.description: Nobody can see what’s going on inside a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Velocity ward
spells.description: Nothing can move faster than a falling feather within a sphere of 15 meter radius

spells.title: Evil Ward
spells.description:
No evil can cross the circle of 15 meter radius. Lasts for 1 hour.
Wall of Force

spells.title: Trigger
spells.description:
Pick one of the spells you know that will activate when a certain condition is met.
Whenever that happens within the designated area(15-meter-radius) the spell will be cast.

spells.title: Reverse Gravity
spells.description: Reverse gravity inside 10x10 meter cube.

spells.title: Slow Time
spells.description: Makes time run 10x slower. 5x5 meter cube

spells.title: Still Magic
spells.description: Stop time for a selected object for 1 minute.

spells.title: Revision Magic
spells.description: Pick an object, creature, or 3x3 meter area, and rewind it's time for up to 1 minute. Revising a person causes them to lose all their memories of what happened during revision time.

spells.title: Speak with Animals.
spells.description: For the next hour you can speak with animals.

spells.title: Animal Courier
spells.description: You can ask a nearby animal to deliver a small item. The destination must be within 3 day’s travel time.

spells.title: Animal Buddy
spells.description:
Recruit a nearby animal, they will follow your orders to the best of their ability.
It can't be smaller than a mouse or bigger than a horse. You can have only one animal partner at a time. If you get separated, it will try to find you. They have 6 HP and can make basic attacks for 2 damage.

spells.title: Fog
spells.description: Produce fog between your hands, it's quickly covering the nearby area, making everyone unable to see beyond their reach.

spells.title: Speak with Trees
spells.description:
Touch a tree trunk, connecting yourself to the nearby forest.
It can help you find a creature or an object located in the forest, a path to a location, or warn you about the nearby danger.

spells.title: Change weather
spells.description:
Summon a storm, a fog, a heatwave, calm the weather, etc.
You can’t cause lightning or natural-disaster level events(tornado, tsunami, etc).

spells.title: Change Season
spells.description: You change the season in the area of 1km around you for the next day.

spells.title: Bond
spells.description:
You develop a telepathic connection with an animal.
You can see/hear through their senses. You can enter a trance to leave your body and take control of your partner. You remain dimly aware of what's happening around your own body.

spells.title: Control Bugs
spells.description: You can control all the insects within 100 meter radius.

spells.title: Beastmaster
spells.description: Once per week you can gather an army of up to 50 nearby animals.

spells.title: Natural Disaster
spells.description: Summon a natural disaster like tornado, hurricane, tsunami, etc.

spells.title: Sense Death
spells.description: Sense whether any remnants of the dead are nearby, their location, and the nature of their death (natural causes, accident, or a faul play).

spells.title: Last Moments
spells.description: Touch a dead person/creature, and see what they have seen during the last 5 seconds of their life.

spells.title: Speak to the Dead
spells.description: Touch a dead person/creature to summon their ghost. You can talk/communicate with it for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Raise a zombie
spells.description:
Turns a dead body into a zombie. It obeys your commands and can attack enemies.
Raise undead. The raised person has their memories and is able to speak.

spells.title: Posess
spells.description: Touch any dead creature, and make it the host of the nearby ghost. The ghost can now use it's body, and remember fragments of their memories.

spells.title: Ticking Bomb
spells.description: Curse the person's/creature's heart, causing it to explode instantly, or at any point within the next year.

spells.title: Steal Life
spells.description: Steal one person's/creature's life force and give it to another. Aging the source and making the target proportionally younger.

spells.title: Bestow Sentience
spells.description: Touch a non-sentient creature, and bestow the gift of sentience and intelligence onto it.
